name: Welcome to the METANOVEL
description: This is a tech development demo for an interactive meta fiction adventure that is to come.
directions:
INSTRUCTIONS

- Type 'north' to go North.
- Type 'south' to go South.
- Type 'east' to go East.
- Type 'west' to go West.
- Type 'up' to go Up.
- Type 'down' to go Down.
- To Quit the game type 'quit

Type 'north' now to begin the adveture.
